about_the_game:
Someone got pulled into a different world and became a ball. Can it reach the escape portal at the top of the world? What will it become when it arrives?


GO SOME BALLS is a 3D platforming challenge about struggling upwards as a ball! A mysterious voice is helping you along. You may face many falls and defeat during the journey. But don't worry, and the voice will always be with you.

Gameplay:




Resist inertia
When you have hands and feet, you can control your posture and stop anytime. When you are a ball, you may not stop the inertia of rolling forward, nor can you stop the elasticity of hitting the ground.

Accept risks
The only way forward is up, and your only enemy is yourself! If you are not careful, you may bounce in an unknown place. Getting over it and restarting again.

Choose your path
During your journey of going up, you will need to choose your path. A difficult path may bring you up faster, and an easy path may let you fall less.

The game includes:

  • Realistic physics simulation in Unreal Engine 5.3
  • Easy and difficult routes and you can choose your way.
  • Beautiful graphics (if your computer can withstand it).
  • Lose your progress over and over.
  • Feel frustration.
  • 0.5 to ∞ hours of inspirational gameplay, depending.

The game does not include:

  • Incredibly difficult control system
  • Many bugs that may let you fall
  • The extremely difficult level that you must pass

Now, Roll and Jump!

Now, Roll and Jump!
name: GO SOME BALLS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 950 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-11400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 3050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: You become a bouncy ball in a mysterious world. Can you escape from here? It's a 3D platformer where you'll roll and jump to overcome obstacles. Are you ready to step out of your comfort zone?
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
